HTMLElementTranslate.summary: The translate property of the interface indicates whether an element's attribute values and the values of its node children are to be translated when the page is localized, or whether to leave them unchanged.

remarks.para: It reflects the value of the translate HTML global attribute.

HTMLElementTranslate.value: A boolean value that is true if an element's attribute values and the values of its node children are to be translated when the page is localized, false otherwise.
